title: Sliding Window Technique
text: Used for finding subarray in an array that satisfy given conditions. Maintain a subset of items as your window and resize it till you get what you are looking for.

title: Binary Search Tree
text: What is a Binary Search Tree a.k.a :- BST ? The root node should be greater than all the values on the left and lesser than the values on the right.To satisfy the BST property the right and the left children should as well follow the rule mentioned above.NB : People might say you should not have duplicates on the tree or the duplicates should appear on the left/right.
